name: Amogus 2: Attack of The Sus
description:
Use WASD to move and the mouse to use your knife.

Please tell me about any glitches you find.

umm  don't think the world record works but I'm not gonna fix it

Killing Sus (the actual scientific name for pigs) gets you 1 drip!

Acquiring shoes gets you 10 drip!

Killing crewmates gets you 20 drip!

ENDINGS 

Good End - survive 75 seconds

Bad End - die

Pro Gamer End - die but fast

Pacifist End - no kill

Serial Killer End - kill

Drip End - mong drip

Frozen End - don't use wasd

Piss End - drown in pp
